text: The law of attraction is always working, whether you believe it or not.
author: Rhonda Byrne

text: Your thoughts create your reality.
author: Rhonda Byrne

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Joyce Meyer Quote: 'You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are.'
author: Joyce Meyer

text: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

text: Your thoughts shape your world.
author: Buddha

text: You attract what you are, not what you want. If you want great, then be great.
author: Unknown

text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

text: Your thoughts are the architects of your destiny.
author: David O. McKay

text: The energy you give off is the energy you receive.
author: Tom Steyer

text: You are a living magnet. What you attract into your life is in harmony with your dominant thoughts.
author: Brian Tracy

text: Your vibe attracts your tribe.
author: Unknown

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: The universe will match whatever vibration you put out.
author: Abraham Hicks

text: You can't have a better tomorrow if you're still thinking about yesterday.
author: Charles Kettering

text: Your mind is a garden. Your thoughts are the seeds. You can grow flowers or you can grow weeds.
author: Unknown

text: What you think about, you bring about.
author: Bob Proctor

text: The only limits that exist are the ones you place on yourself.
author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

text: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

text: You are the designer of your destiny. You are the author of your story.
author: Lisa Nichols

text: Your thoughts are the seeds of your future.
author: Bob Proctor

text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

text: Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
author: James Allen

text: You are what you think. So just think big, believe big, act big, work big, give big, forgive big, laugh big, love big, and live big.
author: Andrew Carnegie

text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

text: Your beliefs become your thoughts, your thoughts become your words, your words become your actions, your actions become your habits, your habits become your values, your values become your destiny.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Every thought we think is creating our future.
author: Louise Hay

text: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
author: Aristotle
